page.title: 11LEISURE SURVEY(cont.)
page.content: When asked for what age group people wanted the entertainment for, most people wanted it for all age groups. Virtually everybody said that they would like to see either a disco or youthclub in Ickenham. We also asked a sixth question concerning their shopping habits.More people seemed to go to Uxbridge for their shopping, rather than Ickenham itself.People go to Ruislip aswell for their shopping. For shopping, as for where people went, 8 different places were mentioned, so perhaps this means that Ickenham does not provide enough shops, or a wide variety. Survey carried out by Paula Rhodes and Neela Suchak.
